alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 1:37PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, southeastern Lafayette and northeastern Vermilion Parishes through 200 PM CDT... At 136 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Abbeville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Abbeville, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Erath, Delcambre, Meaux, Coteau, Jefferson Island, Henry and Milton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
